blocks.name: nnunb
blocks.content: The set of positive integers is unbounded above. Theorem I.28 of [Apostol] p. 26. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jan-1997.)
blocks.origin:
thm nnunb(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  |- wn(wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cn, wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  mto(wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cn, wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), wrex(s0, cr, wa(wral(s1, cn, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(hs0))))))))
  nrex(s0, cr, wa(wral(s1, cn, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(hs0)))))))
  mtoi(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wa(wral(s1, cn, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(hs0)))))), wa(wral(s1, cn, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wn(wral(s1, cn, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))))))
  pm3.24(wral(s1, cn, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))))
  anim2d(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wral(s1, cn, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(hs0))))), wn(wral(s1, cn, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1))))))
  3imtr4g(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(hs0))))), wn(wral(s1, cn, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1))))), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cr), wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(hs0)))))), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cn), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))))
  syld(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cr), wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(hs0)))))), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cn), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wbr(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(hs0)))))
  com12(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cr), wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(hs0)))))), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wbr(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(hs0)))))
  syl6ib(wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cr), wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(hs0)))))), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wbr(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(hs0)))), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(hs0))))
  pm2.43d(wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cr), wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(hs0)))))), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(hs0))))
  syl5(wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cr), wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(hs0)))))), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(hs0)))), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cr))
  peano2rem(cv(s0))
  syl7(wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cr), wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(hs0)))))), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(hs0))), wbr(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(s0)))
  ltm1(cv(s0))
  spcv(s1, co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), wi(wcel(cv(s1), cr), wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(hs0))))), wi(wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cr), wi(wbr(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(hs0))))))
  ovex(cv(s0), cmin, nat1)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1)), wcel(cv(s1), cr), wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(hs0)))), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cr), wi(wbr(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(hs0)))))
  eleq1(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cr)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(hs0))), wbr(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(hs0))))
  breq1(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(s0))
  rexbidv(hs0, cn, wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(hs0)))
  breq1(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(hs0))
  df-rex(hs0, cn, wbr(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(hs0)))
  syl6bi(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wbr(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(hs0)))), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cn), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wbr(cv(s0), clt, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))))
  exbidv(hs0, wcel(cv(s0), cr), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wbr(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wbr(cv(s0), clt, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))
  pm5.32da(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wbr(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))
  sylan2(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wb(wbr(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  nnre(cv(hs0))
  mp3an2(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wb(wbr(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))), wcel(nat1, cr))
  1re()
  ltsubadd(cv(s0), nat1, cv(hs0))
  exlimiv(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wbr(cv(s0), clt, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cn), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))))
  sylan(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wbr(cv(s0), clt, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cn), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), cn))
  peano2nn(cv(hs0))
  spcev(s1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), wa(wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), cn), wbr(cv(s0), clt, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cn), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1))))
  ovex(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), wcel(cv(s1), cn), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), cn), wbr(cv(s0), clt, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))
  eleq1(cv(s1), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), cn)
  breq2(cv(s1), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), cv(s0), clt)
  df-ral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(hs0)))))
  con1bii(wral(s1, cn, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cn), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))))
  bitr2i(wn(wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cn), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1))))), wral(s1, cn, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cn), wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1))))))
  df-ral(s1, cn, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1))))
  alinexa(s1, wcel(cv(s1), cn), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))
  mp3an12(wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cn, wo(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), wrex(s0, cr, wa(wral(s1, cn, wn(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cr, wi(wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(hs0))))))), wss(cn, cr), wne(cn, emptycls))
  nnssre()
  ne0ii(cn, nat1)
  1nn()
  sup2(s0, s1, hs0, cn)
  diff.wi.s(s1, wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cr), wi(wbr(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(hs0)))))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cr)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.wi.s(s1, wbr(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(s0)), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(hs0))))
  diff.wbr.s(s1, co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(s0))
  diff.wrex.s(s1, hs0, cn, wbr(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(hs0)))
  diff.wbr.s(s1, co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), clt, cv(hs0))
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(s0), cmin, nat1)
  diff.cmin.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  diff.hs0.w(wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cn), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)))))
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), cn), wbr(cv(s0), clt, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), cn)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, cv(s0), clt, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.clt.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.caddc.s(s1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.cn.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(cn)
}

blocks.name: arch
blocks.content: Archimedean property of real numbers. For any real number, there is an integer greater than it. Theorem I.29 of [Apostol] p. 26. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jan-1997.)
blocks.origin:
thm arch(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cr), wrex(s0, cn, wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  vtoclri(hs0, c0, cr, wrex(s0, cn, wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0))), wrex(s0, cn, wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s0))))
  rexbidv(s0, cn, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)))
  breq1(cv(hs0), c0, clt, cv(s0))
  ax-mp(wral(hs0, cr, wrex(s0, cn, wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s0)))), wral(hs0, cr, wn(wral(s0, cn, wo(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))))
  mpbir(wral(hs0, cr, wn(wral(s0, cn, wo(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))), wn(wrex(hs0, cr, wral(s0, cn, wo(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))))
  nnunb(hs0, s0)
  ralnex(hs0, cr, wral(s0, cn, wo(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))
  ralimia(hs0, cr, wn(wral(s0, cn, wo(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))), wrex(s0, cn, wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s0))))
  syl5bir(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wn(wral(s0, cn, wo(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))), wrex(s0, cn, wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s0))), wrex(s0, cn, wn(wo(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))))
  rexnal(s0, cn, wo(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  reximdva(s0, cn, wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wn(wo(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s0)))
  biimprd(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wn(wo(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s0)))
  syl6bb(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s0)), wn(wo(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wn(wo(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(hs0)))))
  sylan2(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(s0), cn), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s0)), wn(wo(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(hs0))))), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  nnre(cv(s0))
  axlttri(cv(hs0), cv(s0))
  notbii(wo(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(hs0))), wo(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  bitri(wo(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(hs0))), wo(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(hs0))))
  orbi1i(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  equcom(hs0, s0)
  orcom(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, cn, wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), cr)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm arch(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℝ → ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ, c0[<]s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  vtoclri(hs0, c0, cr, ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ, c0[<]s0), ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ, hs0[<]s0))
  rexbidv(s0, cn, hs0 = c0, hs0[<]s0, c0[<]s0)
  breq1(hs0, c0, clt, s0)
  ax-mp(∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ, hs0[<]s0)), ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ¬ ∀(s0 ∈ ℕ,(s0[<]hs0 ∨ s0 = hs0))))
  mpbir(∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ¬ ∀(s0 ∈ ℕ,(s0[<]hs0 ∨ s0 = hs0))), ¬ ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ ℕ,(s0[<]hs0 ∨ s0 = hs0))))
  nnunb(hs0, s0)
  ralnex(hs0, cr, ∀(s0 ∈ ℕ,(s0[<]hs0 ∨ s0 = hs0)))
  ralimia(hs0, cr, ¬ ∀(s0 ∈ ℕ,(s0[<]hs0 ∨ s0 = hs0)), ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ, hs0[<]s0))
  syl5bir(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ¬ ∀(s0 ∈ ℕ,(s0[<]hs0 ∨ s0 = hs0)), ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ, hs0[<]s0), ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ, ¬(s0[<]hs0 ∨ s0 = hs0)))
  rexnal(s0, cn, (s0[<]hs0 ∨ s0 = hs0))
  reximdva(s0, cn, hs0 ∈ ℝ, ¬(s0[<]hs0 ∨ s0 = hs0), hs0[<]s0)
  biimprd((hs0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s0 ∈ ℕ), ¬(s0[<]hs0 ∨ s0 = hs0), hs0[<]s0)
  syl6bb((hs0 ∈ ℝ ∧ s0 ∈ ℕ), hs0[<]s0, ¬(s0[<]hs0 ∨ s0 = hs0), ¬(hs0 = s0 ∨ s0[<]hs0))
  sylan2(hs0 ∈ ℝ, s0 ∈ ℕ, (hs0[<]s0 ↔ ¬(hs0 = s0 ∨ s0[<]hs0)), s0 ∈ ℝ)
  nnre(s0)
  axlttri(hs0, s0)
  notbii((hs0 = s0 ∨ s0[<]hs0), (s0[<]hs0 ∨ s0 = hs0))
  bitri((hs0 = s0 ∨ s0[<]hs0), (s0[<]hs0 ∨ s0 = hs0), (s0 = hs0 ∨ s0[<]hs0))
  orbi1i(hs0 = s0, s0[<]hs0, s0 = hs0)
  equcom(hs0, s0)
  orcom(s0 = hs0, s0[<]hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.w(∃(s0 ∈ ℕ, c0[<]s0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, cr)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: nnrecl
blocks.content: There exists a positive integer whose reciprocal is less than a given positive real. Exercise 3 of [Apostol] p. 28. (Contributed by NM, 8-Nov-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm nnrecl(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wrex(s0, cn, wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s0)), clt, c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wrex(s0, cn, wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s0)), clt, c0)), wrex(s0, cn, wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, cv(s0))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wrex(s0, cn, wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, cv(s0))), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cr))
  arch(s0, co(nat1, cdiv, c0))
  rexbidva(s0, cn, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s0)), clt, c0))
  bitrd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s0)), clt, c0), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s0)), clt, co(nat1, cdiv, co(nat1, cdiv, c0))))
  syl2an(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cn), wb(wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s0)), clt, co(nat1, cdiv, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)))), wa(wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, co(nat1, cdiv, c0))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0))))
  jca(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)))
  rereccld(c0, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0))
  recgt0(c0)
  jca(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)))
  nnre(cv(s0))
  nngt0(cv(s0))
  ltrec(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cv(s0))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cn), wb(wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s0)), clt, co(nat1, cdiv, co(nat1, cdiv, c0))), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s0)), clt, c0)))
  breq2d(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s0)), clt, co(nat1, cdiv, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), c0, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)))
  recrecd(c0, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wcel(c0, cc))
  recn(c0)
  gt0ne0(c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat1, cdiv, c0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, nat0, clt, c0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.clt.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: bndndx
blocks.content: A bounded real sequence ` A ( k ) ` is less than or equal to at least one of its indices. (Contributed by NM, 18-Jan-2008.)
blocks.origin:
thm bndndx(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cn, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))))), wrex(s1, cn, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  rexlimiv(s0, cr, wral(s1, cn, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)))), wrex(s1, cn, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s1))))
  sylib(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wi(wral(s1, cn, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)))), wrex(s1, cn, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s1)))), wrex(s1, cn, wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s1)))))
  mpd(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wrex(s1, cn, wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s1)))), wrex(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1))))
  arch(s1, cv(s0))
  reximdva(s1, cn, wcel(cv(s0), cr), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s1))))
  sylan2(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cn), wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s1), cr))
  nnre(cv(s1))
  com23(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s1)))
  imp4b(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr), wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)), wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s1))))
  com3l(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr), wcel(c0, cr), wi(wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)), wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s1)))))
  exp5o(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s1)))
  syld(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr)), wa(wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1))), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s1)), wbr(c0, clt, cv(s1)))
  lelttr(c0, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr), wi(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s1)), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s1))))
  ltle(c0, cv(s1))
  r19.35(s1, cn, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0))), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s1)))
  diff.wrex.s(s0, s1, cn, wbr(c0, cle, cv(s1)))
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, cle, cv(s1))
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), cr)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
}
